title: PARALLEL BATTERY SYSTEMS
fullText:
For a BESS consisting of two or more battery systems connected in parallel, the output cable or busbar from each battery system to a point where the parallel battery systems connect (e.g. PCE or junction box), shall have equal resistance. This can be achieved by the cables which connect the battery systems to a common connection point being of equal length, equal cross-sectional area and conductor materials.
Exception â€” This requirement does not apply where there is a BMS or similar device that provides managed voltage and current charge/discharge control to each separate system.
